titleStmt.title: A proclamation, concerning the advocats
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the twelfth day of December 1674. years, and of our reign the twenty sixth year."
Place and date of imprint suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: torn with loss of some imprint information.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
